name: Life Line (Tereza Roztocilova)
description:
We made a run simulator to refer life, It's a 3D fps game, along the way were facing challenges, they effect our status, we need to keep health as much as possible when health reaches zero we'll die. The player need to choose wisely and if want to see good end need to reach his-hers dreams.

P.S. the pause button is on K - we forgot to change it :)

Team Sparkly Unicorns:

Mânâlı#3772
